import React, {Component} from 'react'; import logo from "../images/ezgif-1-e382b6df9dbb.png"; import Navbar from "react-bootstrap/Navbar"; import Nav from "react-bootstrap/Nav"; import "./UserProfile.css"; class UserProfile extends Component { state = { name: 'Zoe Zhao', email: 'zoefyz12@gmail.com', orderId: '000001', orderStatus: 'Picked', date: '04/08/2019', totalPrice: '$10.47', ordername: ['NEW Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese Bacon', 'NEW Quarter Pounder®* Deluxe', 'Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese'], pic: ['https://www.mcdonalds.com/content/dam/usa/documents/fresh-beef/qpc-bacon.jpg', 'https://www.mcdonalds.com/content/dam/usa/documents/fresh-beef/qpc-deluxe.jpg', 'https://www.mcdonalds.com/content/dam/usa/documents/fresh-beef/qpc.jpg'], rows: ['1','1','1'], price:['$2.69','$4.29','$3.49'] }; render() { return (
Welcome, Customer    
  • this.props.history.push('/')}>Main Page
    •

    User Information

    Name: {this.state.name}

    Email: {this.state.email}

    Order History

    OrderId: {this.state.orderId}
    OrderStatus: {this.state.orderStatus}
    Date: {this.state.date}
    TotalPrice: {this.state.totalPrice}
    {this.state.rows.map((item, idx) => ( ))}
    Picture Name Price

    {this.state.ordername[idx]}

    {this.state.price[idx]}
    ); } } export default UserProfile;
